I was able to reproduce, with the NPe occuring on line 35 (line 43 is a bracket).  Occurs when the action is run with no selection.

Created an attachment (id=61476)
Proposed patch

Patch adds null check for the selection.  Also checks that the selection is not empty and that the selected element is a java variable.

The enablement expressions are intended to disable the action when any of the above requirements do not hold true, but it is possible to run the action anyways.

Applied patch with modification - the logic for when to show references was negated where it should not be. Testing the first element for instanceof means we don't need to test the size of the selection (as null will test false for instanceof).
